=== Purchase Information === Product Title: PMD Personal Microderm Replacement Discs - Includes 6 Discs and 1 Filter - For Use With Classic, Plus, Pro, Man, and Elite Review Date: 2015/06/09 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PMD Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Aluminum crystal', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Promotes fresh cell growth and reduces the appearance of blemishes, fine lines and wrinkles and large pores.Promotes fresh cell growth and reduces the appearance of blemishes, fine lines and wrinkles and large pores. See more', 'Item Volume': '1 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 2.27 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1303', 'Department': 'unisex-adult', 'UPC': '855394003034', 'Manufacturer': 'PMD Personal Microderm', 'Country of Origin': 'Vietnam', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More'} Review Text: Loving my PMD!
Bought these because I'm extra sensitive on cheeks. Review Title: Great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [KARADIUM] PUCCA LOVE EDITION Cheek & Shading 5.4g - 5 Colors (#03 BABY PINK) Review Date: 2017/05/31 Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 2.3 x 0.4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '887406060773'} Review Text: Nice smooth texture and good payoff with finger swatch. Very nice girlish colour. No smell. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soap for Geeks - BEST SELLER! 6 oz Soap by Whiskey River Soap Co. Review Date: 2018/06/22 Store: Whiskey River Soap Co. Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Whiskey River Soap Co.', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.9 x 2.5 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEE-S', 'UPC': '687437825361'} Review Text: Smells so good Review Title: Yummy Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Holika Holika [Sweet Peko Edition] Peko Melty Jelly Blusher Tint 03 Melting Strawberry … Review Date: 2019/05/10 Store: HOLIKA HOLIKA Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Brand': 'HOLIKA HOLIKA', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.9 x 1.8 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: The pot is three times the size it needs to be.
The product fills up about 1/4.
Seems like there is way too little product for the cost. Review Title: Deceitful photo describing product. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Pre-Tox Peel Off Antioxidant Face Mask with Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Vitamin E & Blackberry Complex, Non-Comedogenic, Paraben- & Phthalate-Free, 0.35 oz (Pack of 3) Review Date: 2019/11/05 Store: Aveeno Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aveeno', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliator,Exfoliate', 'Scent': 'Blackberry', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalate-free,Paraben-free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 3.62 x 0.47 inches; 1.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '191567912414'} Review Text: Never has a peel off mask removed a layer of skin.
Be very careful.
I’m always able to use them to this area which is the high cheek not the under eye.
Never any issues before with other products but for some reason this one it was. Review Title: Very agressive peel off mask which took skin with it. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ALICE 13x6 Lace Front Brown Wig, 22" Long Deep Part Silky Straight Synthetic Flaxen Brown Wig for Women, Pre Plucked with Natural Hairline and Baby Hair Review Date: 2020/01/19 Store: ALICE Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ALICE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.57 x 7.72 x 1.89 inches; 14.11 Ounces'} Review Text: Mine is not brown. It has Pastel pink on and dark blonde underneath. it’s also way too big even when the straps are adjusted. I feel like I didn’t get anything close to what I ordered. Review Title: Not what I ordered. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Oil of Life Sensitive Skin Body Wash 3 Pack ~ 2 in 1 Sensitive Skin Moisturizing Body Wash Soap for Men, Women 15oz Made in Oil of life body wash oil of life body wash 0 Review Date: 2022/07/19 Store: Oil Average Rating: 2.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oil', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.58 x 5.47 x 3.23 inches; 3.33 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'oil of life body wash', 'UPC': '637740060225'} Review Text: I enjoyed this body wash.
Doesn’t smell like much which I like.
Lathers well. Review Title: Enjoyed Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed significant satisfaction with a variety of products. Notably, the personal care items showcased their effectiveness, particularly in promoting skin health and achieving a desirable appearance. The user appreciated smooth textures and pleasant scents in cosmetic products, emphasizing satisfaction with color payoffs and overall performance. High ratings in reviews signify a consistent enjoyment of the aesthetics and functionalities of these beauty items, underscoring a positive trend in the user’s purchase experiences.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
On the downside, the user encountered several frustrations, particularly concerning product transparency and packaging. There were complaints about misleading representations, notably with products appearing larger than their actual content. Specific issues included ineffective or overly aggressive products that caused skin irritation, as well as mismatches between ordered items and received products. These negative experiences highlight a notable discontent with certain purchases and raised concerns about quality control and accuracy in product descriptions.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user's shopping behavior reflects a blend of positive experiences with certain beauty products, marked by strong preferences for effective skin treatments and enjoyable textures. However, these positive encounters were tempered by negative experiences involving product misrepresentations and unsatisfactory performance. While many items were well-rated and appreciated, critical feedback on a few purchases suggests that there is room for improvement in transparency and quality assurance in product offerings. This duality underscores the complexity of consumer satisfaction within the user's purchasing history.

target_interaction.title: Horrible
target_interaction.text:
This polish is so sheer and streaky.
I love the brush sure but the quality of the polish itself is horrible.
I have to do three coats and the end result ain’t worth the extra time and patience it requires.
target_interaction.title_meta: wet n wild Megalast Nail Color, Under Your Spell, 0.45 Fluid Ounce
features: A revolutionary resin polymer system for exceptional color adhesion
Calcium and mineral fortified to help prevent nail discoloration
Our ManiCurve Pro Brush is absolutely incredible - The rod is flat so the liquid drains down to the bristles equally, and the rounded bristles hug your nail curves perfectly
description: All the end results of going to the nail salon, but without the hassle. The driving, the sitting, the waiting, the forced small-talk, and especially the pricey manicurist bills - forget it! Looking salon pampered just got easier! These 5-day, chip-resistant formulas are just so darn great, delivering a professional, yet far more accessible, look. Ever wonder what actually makes a "salon" formula? Read the features!
